document.full_text: israel's top general said on tuesday the military is making preparations to stop a new aid flotilla that pro-palestinian groups plan to dispatch in late june to the gaza strip in defiance of an israeli naval blockade.
document.title: israeli military says will stop new gaza flotilla
lines_and_colors: israel's top general said on tuesday the military is making preparations to stop a new aid flotilla that pro-palestinian groups plan to dispatch in late june to the gaza strip in defiance of an israeli naval blockade.
